#summary Game Compatibility List
#labels Featured

=== Mode Info ===
  Modes correspond to FakeMODE option in ini file
  # Normal Mode - makes gamepad XInput compatible
  # Compatibility Mode - change gamepad intro XBOX 360 Controller

= Compatible Games =

  * Blur
  * Call Of Juarez Bound In Blood

== Compatibility Mode ==

  * Assassin's Creed
  * Assassin's Creed II
  * Splinter Cell Conviction
  * Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X

=== Notes: ===
  * If not specified, game uses xinput1_3.dll
  * Most SEGA games do not display XBOX360 Controller buttons.
  * Race Driver GRID works fine in game, but game will freeze on exit.

= Not Compatible Games =
  * Blazing Angels 2  Secret Missions of WWII
  * FIFA 10
  * Spider-Man(TM) - Shattered Dimensions
  * Marvel - Ultimate Alliance
